alert.note: Alert for Collin; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 7:29PM CDT until July 03 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Collin County in north central Texas... Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 729 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gunter to Whitesboro, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Whitesboro, Denison, Anna, Celina, Van Alstyne, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Lake Texoma, Preston, Southmayd, Tioga, Weston and Sadler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
